This course is a combination of lectures, discussions, pair work, presentations and group work.


Online simultaneous during the state of emergency
Face-to-face once the emergency has ended

During the state of emergency, this course will be held online simultaneously via Zoom. The Zoom link will be provided on Luna as well as through email sent to the student's KGU registered email address. The instructor will send out information about the first meeting and when to meet *before* it is held on Sept. 21. Therefore, please be sure to check your university email (e.g., ___@kwansei.ac.jp) a few days before the start of the semester. Currently, it seems that the state of emergency will be lifted sometime in November. If that happens, we will return to face-to-face lessons. Students may use the regularly assigned classrooms on campus if they wish to conduct Zoom lessons on campus.
